title: Christmas in the Movies (Revised & Expanded Edition): 35 Classics to Celebrate the Season
description: Now revised and expanded with more beloved films and loads of special features and photos across 70+ pages of new content, this is the must-have viewing guide for the holidays, showcasing the greatest and most beloved Christmas movies of all time.Nothing brings the spirit of the season into our hearts quite like a great holiday movie. Turner Classic Movies'  Christmas in the Movies  showcases the very best among this uniquely spirited strain of cinema. Each film is profiled on what makes it a "Christmas movie," along with behind-the-scenes stories of its production, reception, and legacy. Complemented by a trove of full-color and black-and-white photos, this volume is a glorious salute to a collection of the most treasured films of all time.Among the 35 films   The Shop Around the Corner ,  Holiday Inn ,  Meet Me in St. Louis ,  It's a Wonderful Life ,  Miracle on 34th Street ,  White Christmas ,  A Christmas Story ,  National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation ,  Die Hard , Home Alone ,  Little Women , The Preacher's Wife , Love Actually , The Nightmare Before Christmas , and many more.
author: Jeremy Arnold
